text: Alicia Rhett (February 1, 1915 â€“ January 3, 2014) was an American painter and actress. She appeared in several movies, but was more known for painting portraits. She played India Wilkes in Gone with the Wind. She was born in Savannah, Georgia. She died at age 98 in Charleston, South Carolina. ==References== ==Other websites== * * New York Times biography Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:1915 births Category:2014 deaths
title: Alicia Rhett
